issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Test that the final schema is expected in integration tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10036](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10036). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, our integration tests convert a Recordbatch to a string, which we use for testing, but they do not test that the final schema matches our expectations.

We should add a test for this, which includes:
1. field name
1. field type
1. field nulability
   
   for every field in the schema.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10036?focusedCommentId=17332295) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-datafusion/issues/101
